title: Former NBA Star Odom Moves to LA Hospital
text:
Former NBA Star Odom Moves to LA Hospital 
Entertainment : Tuesday 20th October, 2015 
Former NBA star Lamar Odom has been moved to a Los Angeles hospital for more treatment sources say. 
Hospitalized in Nevada for nearly a week after collapsing in a brothel where 
officials said he had used cocaine, Odom was reportedly discharged on 
Monday. 
Odom, 35, was flown by helicopter from the Sunrise Hospital and Medical Center in Las Vegas accompanied by his wife, reality television personality Khloe Kardashian, the celebrity news website E! News reported, citing unidentified sources. 
E! Online reported that the two-time NBA champion remained on dialysis because of a kidney problem but had passed a swallowing test and was able to breathe on his own. E! also said Odom was able to communicate with family members by using hand signals. 
"Each day Lamar is getting stronger and reaching significant milestones in his recovery," a statement from Odom's aunt JaNean Mercer said Monday. "We are committed to remaining by his side as a family for our champion, who we love immensely." 
Some material for this report came from AFP and AP. More Story Industry News
